Summary: Lessons: images in multiple columns exceed the boundary of a block – see screenshot
Description:
* Log into Sakai 11 and click on a Lessons tool
* Using ‘Add Colum break’ to create four blocks 
* For each block, add an image using ‘Embed content on page’ option.  Make sure all four images are the same width, e.g. 300px
* Once all images are added to the page, use the mouse to make the browser windows smaller.  You can see that the images will exceed the boundary of the blocks –see attached screenshot.  In another words, the images are not responsive.
Creator: Fawei Geng
